name: Shoot 'Em Up!
description:
Bullet trail animation by PixelBoy - https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/Pixelboy/

Walking animation referenced from Bandygrass - https://www.reddit.com/r/PixelArt/comments/5ii92e/oc_walk_cycle_tutorial_by_bandygrass/

~~~CONTROLS~~~~

WASD - movement

Mouse - aim

Left click - shoot

Q - use health pack (oranges!)

Space - pause 

Click anywhere while paused - purchase 1 orange for 10c
